law.text: A tribunal of this state authorized to determine parentage of a child may serve as a responding tribunal in a proceeding to determine parentage of a child brought under KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902 or a law or procedure substantially similar to KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 32, effective June 24, 2015.
